name: 'REPLICA' Memory Box Mini Perfume Sampler Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description: Discover 10 mini unisex fragrances that transport you to treasured moments of the past including Lazy Sunday Morning, Jazz Club, Beach Walk, Sailing Day, Autumn Vibes, By the Fireplace, Bubble Bath, Under the Lemon Trees, Springtime in a Park and When the Rain Stops...About the Bottle:  Influenced by the look of classic apothecary jars, the luxe perfume bottle carries a cotton label with black ink text and a unique pump wrapped with rope as an homage to the original couture line...This Set Contains:.10x0.07 oz/2 mL fragrances, including:.-Beach Walk Eau de Toilette.-Jazz Club Eau de Toilette.-Lazy Sunday Morning Eau de Toilette.-By the Fireplace Eau de Toilette.-Bubble Bath Eau de Toilette.-Under the Lemon Trees.-Sailing Day.-Autumn Vibes.-When the Rain Stops.-Springtime In a Park

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Spray mini fragrance in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_text: I really like this samplers set. Easy to put on pockets to bring it everywhere and everyday. One smell for each day. I like the under the lemon tree and on a date smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I love Maison Margiela fragrances!  You can get many uses from this sampler pack as each sample is much more than a one-time use!  I love the variety that‚Äôs offered here and the packaging is perfect for travel (though they aren‚Äôt capped, but I don‚Äôt see it as an issue).  These are so cute and smell sooo good!!  Beach Walk is my favorite for summer and Autumn Vibes is a fall staple to have in your collection!

reviews.review_title: Would Like Option to Get Full Size with Review
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm glad that I got the opportunity to try various scents from the Replica Collection. I absolutely love having the ability to sample a different scent for every occasion, but also that I have choices to get a better idea of the brand and quality instead of basing my opinion off of one scent. So far, they are each nice notes, but I'll need to test the longevity and the ongoing appreciation for each scent. Would like an option to get a full size with review.

reviews.review_text: The scents are all amazing!! I literally couldn‚Äôt even choose my favorite. This little sample box is travel friendly and is perfect for on the go! This is the best value for your money because it gives you a variety of scents to choose from! Then if you have a few favorites you can buy the big bottles without having the fear of not liking the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on the Maison Margiela Paris 'Replica' perfume collection, and I'm absolutely in love! Each scent is inspired by the reproduction of familiar moments and places, and they truly capture the essence of those memories. From 'Bubble Bath' to 'Lazy Sunday Morning,' and my personal favorites 'Under the Lemon Tree' and 'Lazy Sunday Morning,' every fragrance in this collection is a sensory journey. They honestly all smell so fresh and real‚Äîit's like they bottled the experience! Whether I‚Äôm feeling relaxed, adventurous, or nostalgic, there‚Äôs a scent that perfectly matches my mood. I highly recommend this collection to anyone who loves to experience a moment through scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! From the moment I opened the shipping box I could tell I was going to love these scents! There are so many to choose from, I am really going to enjoy changing up my scent depending on my mood for the next few months. I usually just stick with one boring scent and this is a great way to sample and change things up. I have thrown one in every purse and travel bag I have so I will always be prepared! These testers are much larger and fuller than the typical sample sized testers you get for free. One should last a few weeks depending on how heavy you like to layer your scents. The value is definitely there especially when you consider the variety, there are several months of use in this beautifully curated collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this set! You get to experience all of the amazing scents from replica which feel like a warm hug. These are perfect to throw in your purse/clutch to be able to reapply. The packaging and presentation was very nice as well as the variety of scents. The fragrances themselves are long lasting. I highly recommend buying this before purchasing a full bottle so you can experience each one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this is a great way to get to know what fragrances you like because there's such a variety. I ended up liking most of them. My top three were Beach Walk, Lazy Sunday Morning, and Springtime in the Park. I'm definitely considering buying a full bottle of the first two. $4 per 2mL is definitely not bad for samples. The sprayer on these is great too. I can't speak for Autumn Vibes, Jazz Club, or By the Fireplace because I don't find myself wearing them out much, but the rest have pretty decent longevity. Under the Lemon Tree (which by the way absolutely smells like limes not lemons) is probably the worst for longevity but that's expected for a citrus I guess. I'd say these are unisex with some being more feminine. The ones I'd say are pretty feminine are lazy sunday morning, springtime in the park, and beach walk, with the rest being relatively unisex. Definitely would recommend this set, especially if you're new to fragrance or looking to explore more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this sample set! Myself, my spouse, and a friend bought it as we all had a different scent in mind and ended up liking almost all of them. The staying power is amazing (definitely a full day of wear) and the scents mellow gorgeously.  My fav is Autumn Vibes - deliciously smoky, soft, comforting and warm. Definitely a forerunner for a daily scent (it is strong, which is what I like, but wouldn't necessarily rec if you work in a close-knit office/in retail/around lots of people, etc.)  Spouse's fav - Sailing Day is a light clean very unisex scent, it settles on the skin nicely and kinda smells like laundry in a really good way.  Friends fav - Jazz Club! Super smoky, delicious, definitely strong, a good going-out in the evening to a jazz club (hah) or a bar/darker-vibe restaurant/etc.  The only reason this isn't getting a 5* is because Under the Lemon Trees smells a lot like a floor cleaner (to me) and When the Rain Stops gave both myself/spouse headaches within moments of trying it (so not necessarily for the scent-sitive).

reviews.review_text: I'm a bit surprised at some of the bad reviews.  I didn't expect to like every scent in this sampler set (at all), but it turned out I actually really liked every one of them on me!  Some are summery scents like Sailing Day, Beach Walk or Under the Lemon Trees, others are so perfect for fall or winter like By the Fireplace or Jazz Club.  I loved the scents so much that my husband just bought me the bigger bottles (5 pack) for Christmas.  They seem to last for hours on me and my husband always loves the smell and asks which one I'm wearing.  I am literally getting ready to purchase the sampler set again before I settle on which big bottle of perfume I want to get.  Autumn Vibes is soooo good.

reviews.review_text: This is a great way to get your hands on a variety of the Replica scents, which is great. The downside? Not one of these was something that I liked in the least. Even if there had been one I liked, I would've considered this set a win. But for me? A big no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the sampler to try and smelled each scent on a paper towel and on skin. Liked the simple paper packaging, although a description of the scents would've been nice. All the sampler bottles have good sprayers and I got several spritzes from each, over 30 when I counted one out. Liked more of the fresher scents hated the warmer scents. Loved Under the Lemon Trees and Lazy Sunday Morning the most. Both smell really nice upon initial application and as they wear down, especially Lazy Sunday Morning. It's fresh and a bit powdery but not overwhelming. Under the Lemon Trees is a sweet citrus scent, exactly as described. I also liked Beach Walk and When the Rain Stops. Beach Walk starts fresh and kinda salty and has a slight coconut sunscreen scent. When the Rain Stops smells floral and grassy to me but in a pleasant way. Both are nice in small doses but get kinda gross if overapplied. Sailing Day was meh, no opinion on Springtime in a Park, kinda smelled like nothing to me, but I may revisit later. I hated By the Fireplace. I hated Jazz Club slightly less, but I don't like smokey scents and the clove or whatever was not hitting for me. Autumn Vibes is also trash in my opinion and went directly in the trash. Bubble Bath is strong and soapy. I'm not sure if I like it. If you like Irish Spring soap, you might like Bubble Bath. If you're doing a blind buy I think Lazy Sunday Morning is the safest bet followed by Under the Lemon Trees.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Perfect Way To Try The Fragrances! So Much Fun!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this set and had so much fun trying these out with my friend! I would have given it 5 stars, but I do think it‚Äôs a bit pricey for samples, and the description says you receive ‚ÄúWhen The Rain Stops‚Äù, but I didn‚Äôt, I received ‚ÄúCoffee Break‚Äù instead. From what I‚Äôve read apparently some people get one and some get the other. On the bright side I received a sample with my order that just happened to be ‚ÄúWhen The Rain Stops‚Äù! I really love it, and I think ‚ÄúCoffee Break‚Äù is really pretty too! I do like a lot of these‚Ä¶ I ended up purchasing a travel size of By The Fireplace, and Autumn Vibes (I want to get When The Rain Stops too!), and the 3.4oz bottle of Beach Walk! Beach Walk is absolutely one of my all time favorite fragrances (for reference a few of my other summer favorites are Tom Ford Soleil Blanc, Nest Sunkissed Hibiscus, Est√©e Lauder Bronze Goddess, JHAG Lust For Sun, and JHAG Vanilla Vibes!)! It has this beautiful suntan lotion like note to it, but prettier and sweeter! By The Fireplace is wonderful for Fall and Winter! It smells extremely similar to B&BW Marshmallow Fireside! For reference, a few of my favorite fall/winter fragrances are Kayali Vanilla 28, Ralph Lauren Beyond Romance, Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Sweet, and Burberry Goddess! I bought this set because unfortunately I don‚Äôt live near anyplace that sells these, so this was a great way for me to finally get to try these! I had a lot of fun with this, found fragrances that I want travel sprays or bottles of, and have these samples to wear if I‚Äôm in the mood!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The names of these scents make it seem like they'll be very different and easy to tell apart. I didn't find this to be the case. They all smelled so similar, and all were deep, musky, and/or soapy. I thought half of them could be gender neutral which is great if you're in to that, but I want to smell sweet and fresh. To be fair, I love Jo Malone Nectarine Honey Blossom and Le Labo Bergamote 22- or sweeter, light, floral oriental fragrances. These would be good for someone who likes heavier, winter-type fragrances. For what it's worth.

These scents are supposed to replicate familiar scents and moments, and I definitely think Maison Margiela did an excellent job capturing each specific scent. By The Fireplace smells exactly like a warm fire is burning with its hints of smoke, Under The Lemon Tree makes me want to wear a sundress and read a book under a lemon tree, and Beach Walk has you ready to pack your bags for a vacation by the ocean. I would definitely wear Springtime in the Park during the Spring, and Bubble Bath has a light, clean scent that is perfect for every day wear. reviews.review_title: I do love perfume sample sets!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Maison Margiela for free in exchange for my honest review. First, I love wearing perfume and I love the thought of getting sample sets of never before smelled perfume. That way you're able to sample perfumes and find your next favorite perfume, without having to buy a large bottle. With that said, unfortunately, I was not able to find my next favorite perfume in this sample set. The Maison Margiela 'Replica' perfume set contains (10) different 2ml scents that are meant to replicate different memories or emotions, such as, Lazy Sunday Morning, By the Fireplace, Autumn Vibes, When the Rain Stops, Springtime in the Park, Beach Walk, Sailing Day, Bubble Bath, Under the Lemon Trees, and Jazz Club. Of the 10 different scents, I did find that I did like Beach Walk and Bubble Bath, however, both of those 2 scents did not seem to last very long, as they were more subtle smelling. I also liked the smell of Autumn Vibes, however, I found that it started giving me a headache and it did seem to last longer. When the Rain Stops and Sailing Day were not one's that I found that I would wear, at all. This set would not be a set that I would buy again, nor did I like any of the fragrances enough that I would choose to buy any, however, I think this set I would choose to use to add a nice smell to different objects, such as when leaving a note for somebody. And although this set wasn't for me, I would recommend it for others to try, due to everyone's personal preferences being different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to receive this amazing Maison Marginal Replica Set as an incentive for my honest review. This is an exceptional variety of fragrances.  This set comes in 10 Sample size fragrances: Jazz Club is a very rich musky fragrance with hints of vanilla and tobacco yet I think this can be worn by anyone.    Under the lemon tree: This smells Citrusy Fresh and clean.  Bubble bath: Now this one smells divine. Its a perfect blend of coconut and lavender. There‚Äôs suppose hints of rose, but its very subtle which I personally like. (Perfect for spring)  Sailing day: This scent I wasn‚Äôt a fan of. It smells like being at a pool, very chlorine scented.    Beach Walk: This smells like a tropical vacation. Hints of rich coconut and bergamot , the perfect combination. (Perfect for summer and spring, but Can be pulled off year round)    Lazy Sunday Morning: This is light , floral and airy. Its a combination of Iris and Lilly of the valley. Perfect for spring and summer  By the Fire Place: Has hints of clove and nuttiness to it, with vanilla notes. It has a slight ash like fragrance to it just like being next to a warm fire on a winter night. (I feel this would be perfect for fall and winter.)  Autumn Vibes: You can smell the red berries and the Cedarwood. To be, this smells like wet leaves after a rainstorm.   When the Rain Stops : This is a scent made for any season. Its light, airy, fresh. The patchouli in it is not over powering. Very lovely.  and Springtime in a Park: Wow! What a beautiful feminine fragrance . This would be perfect for Spring and Summer. The combination of aromas in this  fragrance was perfectly put together. The pear and the musk go hand and hand and the lily of the valley really ties it together perfectly.    For me, my favorites are: Springtime in the park, Jazz Club, By the fireplace, Bubble Bath, and beach walk.  This set is definitely  worth the price!

reviews.review_text: I love trying out new fragrances and was so excited to receive this sample set from Influenster to review! You will definitely be able to find a favorite amongst these! (Mine is Beach Walk, it is very summery and smells like a perfumey sunscreen.) However, if I am honest, I was super hesitant about the price - it seemed like a lot of money for ten sample vials.  But then I did the math and realized that all of these vials combined are equal to more than one of the Replica travel sized fragrances!  So if you are picky with scents and know you like a particular one, then go with a single scent travel size, but if you are looking to give a unique gift or want to expand your fragrance wardrobe then this is the set for you.

The names of the scents, such as Lazy Sunday Morning, Jazz Club, Beach Walk, and more, perfectly encapsulate the essence of each fragrance, allowing you to connect with the scent before even trying it.  Speaking of scents, I was truly impressed by the diversity and range of fragrances included in the set. From the warm and cozy embrace of By the Fireplace to the fresh and invigorating notes of Sailing Day, there's something for every mood and occasion. My personal favorite, Jazz Club, immediately won me over with its spicy and cozy aroma that's perfect for any setting.  What makes the Replica Discovery Set even more appealing is its suitability for both day and night wear. Whether you're heading to the office, relaxing on a lazy weekend, or enjoying a night out, you'll find a fragrance that complements your style effortlessly.  For those who are passionate about discovering the art of fragrance or are simply intrigued by the idea of exploring different notes, this set is an ideal starting point. It's an opportunity to delve into the world of perfumery without committing to a full-size bottle. Whether you're finding your signature scent or just indulging your curiosity, the variety offered by this set is truly unparalleled. reviews.review_text: These arrived pretty empty, like below 3/4th of the bottle but I don't know if it's the right amount. Lots of various scents which is nice if you don't know what you will like. I was going in for 1 or 2 of the perfumes I wanted to properly try, discovered a few more that were interesting. Most aren't for me so I'll be quick.  Jazz Club: leather, whisky and tobacco. What you'd expect from a fancy boy's club. Cool, elevated, citrusy, dark. VERY leather, more masculine.  Lazy Sunday Morning: Flower and lemon cleaning product. Fresh air and laundry. Clean cotton bed sheets and open windows. A bit chemical.  Under the Lemon Trees: Lime, lemon, wood, fresh outside air, reminds me of wood cleaning product with citrus scent, but with less chemical than the above.  By the Fireplace: Smoke and fire, deep, dark, but with fresh air also. Some old, thick evening alcohol, like burbon with a sweet, caramel or mapley, oakey, woody undertone.  Bubble Bath: Powdery soap, lemon and rain. Nondescript flower, pink bubbles and fresh towels. Some chemic scent that might not last. (might be for power, but I didn't try it for long)  Autumn Vibes: Dried leaves, smoked wood, old greenery, a little smoke and sand. Maybe some subtle leather. Amber. Very adult, serious, grown up, unisex.  Sailing Day: Salt water and air, clean marine winds, wooden boat floor washed by old rain. If you don't want beachy, citrusy-clean, but a rather water-based subtle sea scent, this is it.  When the Rain Stops: Wood, lemon, rain, washed up, clean greenery. Nature in so many angles, airy and fresh.  Springtime in a Park: Sweet pale flowers, windy, light air and undergrowth. Powder, freshness.  Beach Walk: Coconut, citruses, sweet and salty air. Blue fresh skies, deep dark water and sandy shells by your feet. Definitely summer.

I had high expectations for this discovery set, but this one turned out to be more of a mixed bag. Some are interesting and complex, but the majority are more one-note. I do marvel at how this collection perfectly captures a memory/moment. Below are some impressions that come to mind for each of the 10 samples.  Jazz Club: reminds me of an older gentleman in a nice suit waiting at a bar Lazy Sunday Morning: smells exactly like its title. It's a whiff of fresh clean sheets that make you want to sleep in! Under the Lemon Trees: clean, pleasant, uplifting citrus smell as if you're passing by an orchard By the Fireplace: Cozy, spicy notes as if you're sitting by a campfire Bubble Bath: powdery and soapy like a clean bath Autumn Vibes: smells remarkably like fall, as if you're sitting on a huge pile of dried leaves Sailing Day: reminds me of a cheap, masculine cologne Coffee Break: coffee with a little bit of cream that turns into liquor (like Irish coffee) Beach Walk: smells like cheap sun tan lotion or the smell of a public bathroom after it's been sanitized Spring Time in a Park: slightly sweet floral and reminds me of the soap used at a 3-star hotel like Courtyard Marriott or a Holiday Inn

reviews.review_title: Great for scent layering, love this set!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I got this set for Christmas last year because I love under the lemon trees (it‚Äôs citrusy and spicy) and wanted to try some of the other scents. I never liked the smell of them in Sephora but figured this was a good chance to try them out over a longer period of time. I will say these scents are very unique and some of them (the more floral ones) I thought I absolutely hated them upon smelling the bottle but once I wore them a few times and they dry down into your skin they smell really good. This set is awesome for scent layering as well. Whispers in the library I‚Äôm not sure how to describe it it‚Äôs rich and sultry definitely my go to after under the lemon trees. I like that these scents aren‚Äôt like any other perfumes I have, the minis are more expensive than other mini sets but I feel like you still get enough of each scent to determine if it‚Äôs for you or not. They are more mild in terms of potency in that they don‚Äôt fill a room with scent after you apply it  but I‚Äôm more of a ‚Äúneck and wrists girl when it comes to perfume and not a spray and sashay, maybe that‚Äôs why I like them because they are scents with depth to them so instead of being sickly sweet or just floral I feel like these are the first scents I‚Äôve had that you can smell different notes in them.

I do not regret this decision at all; they all smelled totally different when I got to actually sit with the scents and smell them a few times instead of spraying them on tester papers and quickly giving a first impression. For one, I quite liked quite a few of the scents, though a lot of them were heavy florals and I‚Äôm more of a fruity fragrance person. When I originally smelled Jazz club for example, I absolutely hated it because I thought it smelled like cigarettes, but once I got to know it more, I grew to like it, even though I still don‚Äôt know if I would wear it. But overall, the scents were really beautiful and complex, and my favorite was definitely coffee break if you‚Äôre wondering. So bottom line, go the extra mile and get one of these instead of wasting your time smelling them in the store, thank you :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This set is good if you‚Äôre curious about the Replica scents and want to try them. I myself only liked half of the scents and I don‚Äôt really plan on buying any of them. I‚Äôm disappointed by how little of scents I liked and how they don‚Äôt last very long. Jazz Club and By The Fireplace were way too smokey. At first it smelled fine but once it dried down all I could smell was smoke. Jazz Club was like cigarettes and By the Fireplace was like someone burning cardboard and dried weeds/lawn clippings. Under the Lemon Trees smelled like minty lemon pledge. Bubble Bath is a very clean scent, I liked it but it has a nostalgia factor to me. I may just like it for the nostalgic feeling. Sailing Day smelled like a forgettable, cheap drugstore perfume. I expected more of a lake or ocean scent.  It has a strong alcohol smell that lingered. Beach Walk was enjoyable and smelled like sunblock with a bit of hibiscus. I felt like was teleported to the beach. I would maybe buy this in full size. So, Lazy Sunday Morning was okay. Had a bit of a nostalgia factor but was pretty forgettable. Autumn Vibes smells like anything but autumn. It smells like the basement of a hippie burning incense. Coffee Break was also very enjoyable. It was nice and mellow but unfortunately didn‚Äôt last that long. I was really hyped for Coffee Break but I feel I need to wear it more before I can make a decision on buying a full bottle. And lastly Springtime in a Park was also a clean scent but more floral. Enjoyable but I wouldn‚Äôt buy a full bottle. I think this is a good set to figure out what you like but some of the scents are overhyped. Also these scents don‚Äôt last very long which was also disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TYPO IN SEPHORA DESCRIPTION OF THIS PRODUCT. This item DOES include 10 perfumes BUT it does NOT include the ‚ÄòWhen the Rain Stops‚Äô fragrance, instead of this fragrance it includes the scent ‚ÄòCoffee Break‚Äô. Do with that info what you will.  Personally I did not like the majority of these fragrances. These are Unisex perfumes but to me they seemed a bit more on the masculine side. I think these would be better suited for men. However, I generally like sweet, florally, and girly fragrances. I did like one or two fragrances in this box but not enough to buy a full size bottle. What does impress me about this brand is, how identical they smell to objects, locations, and nostalgic feelings. I do like this sample box. I think it‚Äôs good if you are curious about this brand. The vials are glass (rather than plastic) and feel high quality. I do NOT think this brand is over hyped because it is really great quality however these scents just aren‚Äôt for me.  Due to the fact that Replica is so good at mimicking objects, locations, and nostalgic feelings. I really wish they would make sweeter and girlier fragrances. For example, if they made a scent called Bakery and just had it smell like cakes, cookies, and pies. That would be fantastic and I would buy it in a heart beat. Or if they did one called Chocolate Factory or Candy Shop, or I would even enjoy more floral scents from this brand.   My personal opinion is that this brand isn‚Äôt that unisex, because it is more masculine leaning or more flattering on men. When I walk by I want people to smell me and think ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a sexy women‚Äù or ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a cute girly girl‚Äù or ‚ÄúMmmm someone smells like yummy sweets‚Äù. Whereas, in contrast these perfumes smelled stronger in woody/earthy, pepper/spicy, fresh, and salty notes. Which I think made it too manly.  Overall, I would recommend buying this sampler box rather than buying a travel size of each, just because I don't think this brand is for everyone, even though it is unisex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love being able to try so many different ones! the only problem now is I want full sizes of jazz club and by the fireplace! I already bought coffee break which didn't capture my attention as quickly as jazz club or by the fireplace but after a few days of trying it out I love how it wears on me and how soft and clean it is. Haven't tried most of the summery or spring time scents yet because I'm a firm believer in everything having a season but I'm excited to give them a go when the time is right

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I keep seeing YouTubers raving about these fragrances and I was first intrigued by By the Fireplace but then Jazz Club, Autumn Vibes and Coffee Break, which all can be layered and sort of fit in the same family of smoky spicy. My absolute favorite has been Sailing Day which I have not-so-subtlety hinted to my husband, in case he needs a gift idea. It is just so lovely, bright, optimistic... if you love to be outside and near the water you will recognize the feeling...I'm purchasing the travel size of that one for now. I gifted this set to myself and have been so delighted by the experience of choosing which fragrance I'd like but the scents are not long lasting or terribly strong, which is actually a positive in my book. They layer well if you want to mix it up, if you'd like it to last all day you will likely need to refresh at some point, especially the lighter ones like Bubble Bath, Lazy Sunday Morning, and Sailing Day. Coffee Break is longer lasting on me. My husband and I both liked By the Fireplace but I prefer a deeper scent on him, this has a bit of a smoky sweetness to it like incense. I do feel sensitive to some strong fragrances and have not experienced any headaches or watery eyes from these. The packaging is beautiful and part of the experience. I organized mine in the order I prefer them and push only the bottom ends of the bottles down in the tray to make it easier to get them out. So happy I treated myself to this as I'm trying out new things to expand my collection. The idea of a Memory Box makes it daydreamy and more fun to go through and I couldn't wait to smell each one and to have my husband smell them too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It says it includes When The Rain Stops on the item. It‚Äôs on the site, received it and it is still consist of the old scents without the new one. I expected more from you Sephora, do better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved replica for a while and have been wanting to try some of their scents.  I am very picky when it comes to scents and hate to buy big products that i end up not using.  YES these are small bottles! thats the point!! its amazing variety pack that comes gives you a huge range to choose from and I can now let me husband know which ones i need in the large bottles ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are small bottles that spray, so you have to really set aside the ones you like or purchase right away if you really like something because it‚Äôs gone after a few wears. I will say even the replicas I don‚Äôt like, I like! So this was a great purchase for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Some of the smells are beautiful, but they do not last at all. Some of the smells are straight up rancid to me. It‚Äôs a great product for testing before committing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love all of them. Like being able to have different ones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm an indecisive person and I have been wanting to try mason margiela fragrances for a long time and this set is perfect.

reviews.review_title: Great way to try out these!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this sampler! Perfect way to try out the scents! When the rains stops is not included but there are some great choices. All the sprays worked and I loved them all!
Good samples and great scents. Downside is, as it seems with most scents, the fragrance fades quicker than desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was kind of a waste of money for me.. the only ones that I really loved were Jazz Club and By the Fireplace (I already had the travel sprays of these 2) so this was an unnecessary purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i‚Äôm glad i bought! the samples seem to be larger than a normal sample and most of the scents are good. i do wish they would‚Äôve had a set with all scents cause some of the more popular ones i wanted to try aren‚Äôt in here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like having this because I've been wanting to try out quite a few of this brand's fragrances for a while now. I was so excited to see I could try all these different ones for such an affordable price. the only downside is that a couple of the pumps don't work and I'm not sure how I'm going to get to try out the ones with broken pumps. it's a bit disappointing that a luxury brand like this one would have a faulty product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I opened this I noticed that there isn't a sample of When the Rain Stops, so I wasn't sure if it was supposed to be included. If you look at the front of the box of the product, it's not there, but sure enough it says in the description here that it should come included!   I actually thankfully already have a travel size of that one and I like it a lot, and that's why I wanted to sample the rest of the Replica scents. I just want to warn others that 'When the Rain Stops' won't be included just in case they want to try that specific scent! I'm happy with my purchase otherwise, it's perfect for what I bought it for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great way (and price) to see what scent will suit me best given the price of full sizes. The mister on the vials are good too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited when this came in stock as Ive been wanting to try a sample set of the replica perfumes. Glad I did because the ones i was expecting to like from reading reviews ended up not being my favourite. Some of my favourites were bubble bath, beach walk and coffee break. Was not a huge fan of Autumn vibes or by the fireplace. Probably will buy the full size of beach walk.  However it is a bit expensive for how small they are

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought it would have made a great gift or display item, however, I could not be more disappointed. Three out of the very tiny vials do not work, the vials are in a plastic sleeve and inside a flimsy box. Glad I opened it up before giving it as a gift. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Though a bit pricey, very worthwhile because there were several scents that I unexpectedly loved and others I unexpectedly hated. Very glad this is offered so I do not have to blind buy. These samples can definitely last several sprays. None last very long (4h max) but they are all EDTs so I'm not bothered by that. My favourites are Bubble Bath (soapy coconut), Lazy Sunday Morning (soapy rose) and Coffee Break (milky coffee). Least favourite is Autumn Vibes, which has an amazing opening then unbelievably pickle-y drydown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome tester! It‚Äôs got a really great amount of different scents, and the samples are big enough to where you can try them out for a few days. This set actually made me realize I NEEDED the bigger size of Coffee Break. I highly recommend this if you are curious about the Replica line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic set, bottles are filled to the top and are bigger than the usual travel size. A nice variety of winter and summer fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this box. I have been seeing so many reviews on several of the scents included, and although all the scents are decent, I definitely appreciate being able to find my favorites before purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although the samples in this set are on the smaller side, this product was a great way to try a solid variety of Replica scents. Some of the samples I absolutely loved while some just weren‚Äôt for me, but I‚Äôm glad that I was able to try them all out before committing to a full size bottle. Highly recommend to those who are new to Replica scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I love replica and have been just waiting for a chance to try more of their scents, but most specifically ‚Äúwhen the rain stops‚Äù. The product description claims that the box set includes when the rain stops, but when I received it coffee break is in it‚Äôs place. So far I‚Äôm really enjoying the scents, but I feel a little cheated because I didn‚Äôt get what I ordered. I see in the photo of the box set that when the rain stops isn‚Äôt there, but why would I doubt what the product description said? Anyway, my favourite so far is beach walk it‚Äôs super fresh and summery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm currently on a Replica kick so take it for what that's worth. I love the various smaller sizes (smaller than the individual travel sprays)  they've offered and this is no exception. you get ten (!) scents to try, and because I love collecting and exploring these scents, it's so worth it to help decide which one you like best before purchasing a larger size. the sprays are larger than their typical sample sizes. in the photo, I included their mini coffret size and their standard sample size for comparison.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm honestly really glad I bought this sample box before purchasing any of the full sized scents. After trying these sample sizes, I will not be purchasing the full sized bottles I was interested in haha. There's nothing inherently wrong with these perfumes, they're just not my cup of tea. Some of the scent descriptions don't really pull through in the fragrances in my opinion. The scent that stood out the most to me was By the Fireplace because it genuinely smells smoky and warm. I think this little sample box is a good buy if you're interested in any of these fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW I am stunned! I love every single scent in this sampler. 100% worth it. Clean, sexy, and sweet scents. For reference I love Alien by Thierry Mugler, Viva La Juicy, Bright Crystal Versace, Mon Guerlain, and Burberry Brit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A great option to test the Replica line of fragrances, personally I don‚Äôt love many of the scents. ‚ÄúCoffee break‚Äù is the only one so far that I‚Äôve liked, the rest are very strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought last year's version of this (almost the exact same, just Autumn vibes and bubble bath have been swapped for whispers in the library and at the barber), and I really like it. Not every scent is for me, but that's the point, I was able to try a bunch before committing to (say it with me) by the fireplace! I won't repurchase because I don't like their scents that are lighter and less masculine (beach walk, spring in a park, sailing day) but it's a fun thing to try!

reviews.review_title: worth it but don‚Äôt expect much more than samples
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm glad I purchased this set because I‚Äôve always wanted to try out the replica scents without having to commit to one specific scent. It is definitely overpriced, but the sizes are a bit larger than your average sample. If you‚Äôre trying to find a new fragrance and would rather test a bunch than blind buy, I definitely recommend as there is definitely a scent for everyone in this set! Attached pictures of comparison, the usual replica sample scent is 0.04oz and the ones in these sets are 0.06oz!

I‚Äôm happy with my memory box set. The bottles contain  about .8ml more than the average sample bottle. This is a great purchase for anyone who wants to know what the perfumes smell like before committing to a full size bottle or to carry around in your purse. The box is 7 x 3.5‚Äù

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good tester to get a feel of the Replica line. This was a blind buy, I have never smelt any of the Replica fragrances before and personally I don't like the scents. Glad I bought this instead of any big pricy bottles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great way to test their fragrances without having to commit to a larger size. The pumps are iffy and only work on around 2 of the bottles so be mindful of that. (Takes away a star because of the pumps). Good number of these are also clean, light, and florals. So, if you like fragrances that are very easy and not too in your face then this is for you. If not then I would say this set is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great if you don‚Äôt know which replica scent to get! also the amount you get for the price is quite good! my personal favourites are bubble bath and under the lemon trees. 100% recommend if these scents interest you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This set is great to test out the different Replica fragrances. It lets me know which ones to repurchase in the future. I do wish the products were larger in size. They're a lot smaller than you would expect. Nonetheless, I love many of the scents. They're each so unique in their own ways.

reviews.review_title: Good way to try different fragrances, but small
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great way to try out the Maison Margiela fragrance line! :) I've been curious about this line for awhile, and wanted to do a wear test of these before investing into the full size bottle! So far, my favourite has been by the fireplace! However, these are the EXACT same size as the sephora free sample packages and look identical to them as well. I wish they were a tad bit bigger. But other than that, this is a good way to try the line before making a full investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So happy with this purchase. Really great value especially for the sizes you get and it‚Äôs a perfect way to test out a bunch of different scents before committing to a full size! I hope Replica keeps putting out sample sets like this!!
